official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Madera County, California to Mrs. Lucile Jones, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Madera County, California to Mrs. Lucile Jones.
